channel.title: Help using my own server Please help
channel.description: Hello i need help with my source/client. It opens up fine but when i try and login to my server it tells me on my client that "error connecting to Server". Could someone help me to be able to fix that so i could get on my own server and to be able to check it out etc.? Thank you

item.title: Help using my own server Please help
item.dc:creator: @JoelxDM JoelxDM
item.description:
@JoelxDM wrote:

yeah that didnt work what else should i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Help using my own server Please help
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

Make your ip in source files 127.0.0.1 And in client files go to client.java and find server = and make it your ip address… In client files client.java not the source files.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

if you changed them and compiled, they should work just fine. maybe the source isn’t compatible, like ultimatepkvillage said. a base 317 and a 474 client aren’t, for example.

item.title: Help using my own server Please help
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

set the client IP to 127.0.0.1. that’s your “localhost”.

Read full topic
